Question: EcoFlow Innovation ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
EcoFlow Innovation Ltd

Product: DELTA Pro Ultra

- Scalable whole-house battery generator and backup system
- Single-unit capacity of 6kWh, 7200W output, and 5.6kW solar input
- Stackable design for quick expansion of storage and output
- Compatible with AC power, solar panels, and gas generators
- Smart Home Panel 2 for seamless grid-to-backup transition
- Offers energy consumption monitoring and charging scheduling
- Modular and portable design suitable for off-grid solutions
- EV-grade LFP battery chemistry with over 10 years of daily use
- Prices starting at $4,999 for DELTA Pro Ultra, $1,599 for Smart Home Panel 2
- Bundled package available at $6,399 until Feb. 9, 2024

Source: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ecoflow-launches-delta-pro-ultra-at-ces-2024-the-worlds-first-smart-hybrid-whole-house-battery-generator-302028963.html
Summary_cn:
EcoFlow创新有限公司

产品：DELTA Pro Ultra

- 可扩展的全屋电池发电机和备用系统
- 单元容量为6kWh，输出为7200W，太阳能输入为5.6kW
- 可堆叠设计，快速扩展储存和输出能力
- 兼容交流电源，太阳能电池板和汽油发电机
- 智能家居面板2，实现无缝切换从电网到备用电源
- 提供能源消耗监控和充电计划安排
- 模块化和便携式设计，适用于离网解决方案
- 使用电动汽车级别的LFP电池化学品，可持续使用超过10年
- DELTA Pro Ultra起价为$4,999，Smart Home Panel 2起价为$1,599
- 捆绑套餐截至2024年2月9日可提供，价格为$6,399

来源：https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ecoflow-launches-delta-pro-ultra-at-ces-2024-the-worlds-first-smart-hybrid-whole-house-battery-generator-302028963.html
